item.title: Fix off-by-one error when parsing primitive JSON types "true", "false", and "null". (tags: json)

item.title: Handle writes to auto-vacuum databases within UNLOCKED transactions in the same way as for non-UNLOCKED transactions. (tags: experimental-begin-unlocked)

item.title: Change the display of the P4 operand of CursorHint in EXPLAIN output to function notation. (tags: cursor-hints)
item.description: Change the display of the P4 operand of CursorHint in EXPLAIN output to function notation. (tags: cursor-hints)

item.title: Always provide the BTREE_BULKLOAD hint, even when SQLITE_ENABLE_CURSOR_HINTS is not defined, as that hint gives a 4% performance increase. (tags: cursor-hints)
item.description: Always provide the BTREE_BULKLOAD hint, even when SQLITE_ENABLE_CURSOR_HINTS is not defined, as that hint gives a 4% performance increase. (tags: cursor-hints)
item.dc:creator: drh

item.title: Updated testing of cursor-hints. Remove the test_cursorhint.c file and associated logic in the core and do tests based purely on the newly enhanced EXPLAIN output. (tags: cursor-hints)
item.description: Updated testing of cursor-hints. Remove the test_cursorhint.c file and associated logic in the core and do tests based purely on the newly enhanced EXPLAIN output. (tags: cursor-hints)

item.title: When searching the wal file for a frame, do not search that part that was already checkpointed when the snapshot being read was at the head of the wal file. (tags: wal-read-change)

item.title: *MERGE* Merge in all the trunk changes from the previous year. This breaks the cursor-hint mechanism, but provides a baseline for trouble-shooting. (tags: cursor-hints)
item.description: *MERGE* Merge in all the trunk changes from the previous year. This breaks the cursor-hint mechanism, but provides a baseline for trouble-shooting. (tags: cursor-hints)
item.dc:creator: drh

item.title: Add the sqlite3rbu_savestate() function to the rbu extension. To force rbu to save its state to disk without closing the sqlite3rbu* handle. (tags: trunk)

item.title: Avoid invoking system call unlink() directly from RBU code. Use the xDelete method of the default VFS instead. (tags: trunk)
